summary: Quotes app with backend connectivity issue. User confirmed adding two new quotes: 'If teachers teach, why don't doctors doct?' and 'If time flies, where does it land?' User also requested adding 'If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?'
known_issues: App cannot reach the server on both mobile and desktop — quotes fail to load with an immediate connection error on all platforms.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit and fix the backend actor canister configuration so that the frontend can successfully connect to it on both desktop and mobile. Verify that the canister ID used in the actor instantiation matches the deployed backend canister, that the host/agent configuration is correct for the deployment environment, and that the `getQuotes` query is reachable.

Ensure the frontend agent (in `useActor.ts`) is initialized with the correct IC host URL for the deployed environment. If the host is hardcoded to `localhost` or a development URL, update it to dynamically select the correct host based on whether the app is running locally or in production (e.g., using `window.location.origin` or an environment variable).
Add two new quotes to the app: 'If teachers teach, why don't doctors doct?' and 'If time flies, where does it land?'
Add the following two quotes to the hardcoded quotes list in the backend `getQuotes` query in `backend/main.mo`: 'If teachers teach, why don't doctors doct?' and 'If time flies, where does it land?'
Add the quote 'If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?' to the hardcoded quotes list in the backend `getQuotes` query in `backend/main.mo`.
Add the quote 'If you wait faster, are you technically arriving sooner?' to the hardcoded quotes list in the backend `getQuotes` query in `backend/main.mo`.

projectName: Fix backend connectivity — app cannot reach the server on any platform
